item.title: Problems
item.description: Some of the common Computer Vision Problems are as follows Image Classification Given an image tell whether it contains a cat or not Object Detection Check if particular objects exists in the image and specify their location by putting boundaries around them Neural Style Transfer Repaint image on the left in the style of image on the right
